short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension forces a dark theme on all websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DarkSide is a Chrome extension that forces a dark theme on all websites. With just a single click, you can transform any website into a more comfortable and easier-on-the-eyes dark theme. Whether you prefer a dark theme for reading at night or just want to give your eyes a break from bright screens, DarkSide has you covered. Simply install the extension and let it do the work for you. No more manual theme switching or fiddling with settings - just a seamless dark theme experience on all your favorite websites. Give DarkSide a try today and see the difference for yourself!
